Articles.Content:
I have RasterProp Plugin. I really enjoy what it adds to the IVA. I understand this is a modders tool, but did not find anything else that adds information to the IVA of cockpits like this does.

My question is is there any packages for rasterprop that have been created that change how the screens display information or what information is available? perhaps a script or config that i can drop into the plugin.

Perhaps something that organizes information like Engineer redux into one screen?

I have very little knowledge on how to create a mod and got lost trying to read Mihara's Full documentation which looks like information for mod makers.

Thanks in advance
If you're looking to integrate something into RPM there is a list of plugins available on the release page. Tear into some of those to get a good idea of how to proceed.

I'm quite fond of Hyomoto's MFD: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66198-0-23-5-Kerbal-Space-Industries-26APR14-MFD-1-2

Currently requires this Hotfix patch as well: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66198-0-23-5-Kerbal-Space-Industries-26APR14-MFD-1-2?p=1258586&viewfull=1#post1258586
